name: Crossy Puppy in mid City
description:
The most addictive Crossy Puppy in mid City game which will make you spend hours trying to get the little doggy to cross roads!
Will you be able to pass all the levels?,
Move doggy to cross the roads laid out before him. Cross lots of traffic, star rivers and more!
Control your character with taps and swipes to advance through the level while avoiding hazards.

Features
• Tap to move forward
• Swipe up, down, left and right to move in those directions.
• 3D Graphics
• Real time animations
• Easy to play, hard to master game
